TEXT.S:
bucacay, bocacay
u siwkay nu nipaluma i cakatakalaway atu i teban a takalaw nu bayu'.
u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam wuchiqie
u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay
